tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landmark_court_decisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    landmark_case_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_name VARCHAR(100),
    decision_date DATE,
    judge_name VARCHAR(150),
    plaintiffs VARCHAR(255),
    defendants VARCHAR(255),
    case_summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE landmarks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    landmark_name VARCHAR(255),
    court DECIMAL,
    decision_date DATE,
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(50),
    importance_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE case_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    landmark_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE landmark_court_decisions (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name TEXT,
  court TEXT,
  date_decided DATE,
  summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE legal_arguments (
  argument_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID REFERENCES landmark_court_decisions(id),
  argument_text TEXT,
  argument_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
  research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID REFERENCES landmark_court_decisions(id),
  researcher_name TEXT,
  research_topic TEXT,
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE landmark_court_decisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    court VARCHAR(100),
    decision_date DATE,
    verdict VARCHAR(50),
    overview TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE judges (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_name VARCHAR(100),
    years_on_bench INT
)

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lawyer_name VARCHAR(255),
    law_firm VARCHAR(100),
    speciality VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE parties (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    party_name VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    attorney_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE case_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_content TEXT
)
